body:
Currently `frontendHandlerRetryMaxAttempts` is set 5 and rest of the system (history client/handler, matching client/handler, persistence client) are using a max attempt of 2. This is because frontend service doesn't have client layer retry, only handler layer, so it's using a higher number. 

However, in practice this number seems too high and due to `https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/issues/4732`, a bad read workflow history request can be retried up to (5+1) * (2+1) = 18 times!

Proposal is to fix the linked issue and reduce `frontendHandlerRetryMaxAttempts` to 3, so in the case above we will retry at most 6 times.
title: Reduce frontend handler retry count
